<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Horn of the Sun Aurochs](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1550)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Shadows at Sundown</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Shadows at Sundown](/Sources.aspx?ID=121) pg. 53</row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A horn of the sun aurochs grants a +2 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks when played as an instrument.

<document level="2" id="action-1174" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
